comments:
The following was done with Integration build 20020312 (and has appeared in 
several builds prior). Team2.0 is obviously enabled.

 If I synchronize on a specific file that has changed in the repository (no 
local changes), everything works as expected (I get the sync view, and can 
perform the visual merge). However, if I try to sync on the entire package (or 
directory, or project) that contains the file that has changed in the 
repository, I get an Internal Error with the .log output below. 
 It has a different trace that #8703, so I've entered this as a new bug.

Log: Thu Mar 14 09:19:38 MST 2002
